content: 30 And Moses said unto the sons of Israel— See! Yahweh hath called by name,—Bezaleel､ son of Uri､ son of Hur､ of the tribe of Judah;
content_old: 30 And Moses said unto the sons of Israel— See! Yahweh hath called by name,—Bezaleel､ son of Uri､ son of Hur､ of the tribe of Judah;

content: 31 and filled him with the spirit of God,—in､ wisdom､ in understanding and in knowledge､ and in all manner of execution;
content_old: 31 and filled him with the spirit of God,—in､ wisdom､ in understanding and in knowledge､ and in all manner of execution;

content: 32 to devise skilful designs,—to work in gold and in silver､ and in bronze;
content_old: 32 to devise skilful designs,—to work in gold and in silver､ and in bronze;

content: 33 and in the cutting of stones for setting､ and in the cutting of wood,—to work in any manner of skilful workmanship.
content_old: 33 and in the cutting of stones for setting､ and in the cutting of wood,—to work in any manner of skilful workmanship.

content: 34 To teach also hath he put in his heart, the heart of him､ and of Oholiab—son of Ahisamach､ of the tribe of Dan;
content_old: 34 To teach also hath he put in his heart, the heart of him､ and of Oholiab—son of Ahisamach､ of the tribe of Dan;

content: 1 Thus shall Bezaleel and Oholiab work､ and every man that is wise-hearted､ in whom Yahweh hath put wisdom and understanding, to know how to work any manner of workmanship for the holy service,—according to all that Yahweh hath commanded.
content_old: 1 Thus shall Bezaleel and Oholiab work､ and every man that is wise-hearted､ in whom Yahweh hath put wisdom and understanding, to know how to work any manner of workmanship for the holy service,—according to all that Yahweh hath commanded.

content: 2 So then Moses called upon Bezaleel､ and upon Oholiab, and upon every man that was wise-hearted, in whose heart Yahweh had put wisdom,—every one whose heart lifted him up, to draw near unto the work､ to do it.
content_old: 2 So then Moses called upon Bezaleel､ and upon Oholiab, and upon every man that was wise-hearted, in whose heart Yahweh had put wisdom,—every one whose heart lifted him up, to draw near unto the work､ to do it.

content: 3 And they took､ from the presence of Moses､ all the heave-offering which the sons of Israel had brought in､ for the work of the holy service､ to do it,—howbeit they brought in unto him yet more free-will offerings､ morning by morning.
content_old: 3 And they took､ from the presence of Moses､ all the heave-offering which the sons of Israel had brought in､ for the work of the holy service､ to do it,—howbeit they brought in unto him yet more free-will offerings､ morning by morning.

content: 4 Then came in all the wise men who were doing all the holy work,—man by man､ from his work which they were doing;
content_old: 4 Then came in all the wise men who were doing all the holy work,—man by man､ from his work which they were doing;

content: 5 and spake unto Moses､ saying, More than enough are the people bringing in,—more than is needed for the service pertaining to the work, which Yahweh hath commanded to be done.
content_old: 5 and spake unto Moses､ saying, More than enough are the people bringing in,—more than is needed for the service pertaining to the work, which Yahweh hath commanded to be done.

content: 6 So Moses gave commandment､ and they passed a proclamation throughout the camp､ saying, Let neither man nor woman make any more material for the holy heave-offering. So the people were restrained from bringing in.
content_old: 6 So Moses gave commandment､ and they passed a proclamation throughout the camp､ saying, Let neither man nor woman make any more material for the holy heave-offering. So the people were restrained from bringing in.

content: 7 For the material was enough for all the work､ to make it,—and to spare.
content_old: 7 For the material was enough for all the work､ to make it,—and to spare.

content: 8 Then did all the wise-hearted among the workers of the material､ make the habitation､ of ten curtains,—of fine-twined linen､ and blue and purple and crimson, with cherubim､ the work of the skilful weaver did he make them.
content_old: 8 Then did all the wise-hearted among the workers of the material､ make the habitation､ of ten curtains,—of fine-twined linen､ and blue and purple and crimson, with cherubim､ the work of the skilful weaver did he make them.

content: 9 The length of each curtain was twenty-eight cubits, and the breadth four cubits, for each curtain,—one measure had all the curtains.
content_old: 9 The length of each curtain was twenty-eight cubits, and the breadth four cubits, for each curtain,—one measure had all the curtains.

content: 10 And he joined the first five curtains､ one to another,—and the other five curtains joined he one to another.
content_old: 10 And he joined the first five curtains､ one to another,—and the other five curtains joined he one to another.

content: 11 And he made loops of blue､ upon the border of the first curtain, at the edge of the set,—thus made he in the border of the other curtain､ at the edge of the second set:
content_old: 11 And he made loops of blue､ upon the border of the first curtain, at the edge of the set,—thus made he in the border of the other curtain､ at the edge of the second set:

content: 12 Fifty loops made he in the first curtain, and fifty loops made he in the edge of the curtain that was in the second set,—the loops being opposite one to another.
content_old: 12 Fifty loops made he in the first curtain, and fifty loops made he in the edge of the curtain that was in the second set,—the loops being opposite one to another.

content: 13 And he made fifty clasps of gold,—and joined the curtains one to another with the clasps, and so the habitation became one.
content_old: 13 And he made fifty clasps of gold,—and joined the curtains one to another with the clasps, and so the habitation became one.

content: 14 And he made curtains of goat’s-hair, for the tent､ over the habitation,—eleven curtains did he make them:
content_old: 14 And he made curtains of goat’s-hair, for the tent､ over the habitation,—eleven curtains did he make them:

content: 15 the length of each curtain was thirty cubits, and four cubits was the breath of each curtain,—one measure had the eleven curtains.
content_old: 15 the length of each curtain was thirty cubits, and four cubits was the breath of each curtain,—one measure had the eleven curtains.

content: 16 And he joined five of the curtains by themselves,—and the six curtains､ by themselves.
content_old: 16 And he joined five of the curtains by themselves,—and the six curtains､ by themselves.

content: 17 And he made fifty loops upon the border of the curtain that was outmost in the one set and fifty loops made he upon the border of the curtain of the second set.
content_old: 17 And he made fifty loops upon the border of the curtain that was outmost in the one set and fifty loops made he upon the border of the curtain of the second set.

content: 18 And he made fifty clasps of bronze,—to join together the tent､ that it might become one.
content_old: 18 And he made fifty clasps of bronze,—to join together the tent､ that it might become one.

content: 19 And he made a covering to the tent, of rams’ skins��� dyed red,—and a covering of badgers’ skins above.
content_old: 19 And he made a covering to the tent, of rams’ skins��� dyed red,—and a covering of badgers’ skins above.

content: 20 And he made the boards､ for the habitation,—of acacia wood, for standing up:
content_old: 20 And he made the boards､ for the habitation,—of acacia wood, for standing up:

content: 21 ten cubits the length of each board,—and a cubit and a half the breadth of each board:
content_old: 21 ten cubits the length of each board,—and a cubit and a half the breadth of each board:

content: 22 two tenons to each board, united one to another,—thus made he for all the boards of the habitation.
content_old: 22 two tenons to each board, united one to another,—thus made he for all the boards of the habitation.

content: 23 And he made the boards for the habitation,—twenty boards for the south side southwards;
content_old: 23 And he made the boards for the habitation,—twenty boards for the south side southwards;

content: 24 and forty sockets of silver made he､ under the twenty boards,—two sockets under the first board､ for its two tenons, and two sockets under the next board､ for its two tenons.
content_old: 24 and forty sockets of silver made he､ under the twenty boards,—two sockets under the first board､ for its two tenons, and two sockets under the next board､ for its two tenons.

content: 25 And for the second side of the habitation､ to the north quarter made he twenty boards;
content_old: 25 And for the second side of the habitation､ to the north quarter made he twenty boards;

content: 26 and their forty sockets of silver,—two sockets under the first board, and two sockets under the next board.
content_old: 26 and their forty sockets of silver,—two sockets under the first board, and two sockets under the next board.

content: 27 And for the hinder part of the habitation､ westward made he six boards;
content_old: 27 And for the hinder part of the habitation､ westward made he six boards;

content: 28 and two boards made he for the corners of the habitation,—in the hinderpart.
content_old: 28 and two boards made he for the corners of the habitation,—in the hinderpart.

content: 29 Thus were they to be double beneath, and at the same time should they be entire､ at the top thereof, into each ring,—thus did he for them both, for the two corners.
content_old: 29 Thus were they to be double beneath, and at the same time should they be entire､ at the top thereof, into each ring,—thus did he for them both, for the two corners.

content: 30 Thus were there to be eight boards, and their sockets of silver were sixteen sockets,—two sockets apiece under each board.
content_old: 30 Thus were there to be eight boards, and their sockets of silver were sixteen sockets,—two sockets apiece under each board.

content: 31 And he made bars､ of acacia wood,—five for the boards of the first side of the habitation,
content_old: 31 And he made bars､ of acacia wood,—five for the boards of the first side of the habitation,

content: 32 and five bars for the boards of the other side of the habitation,—and five bars for the boards of the habitation at the hinderpart westward.
content_old: 32 and five bars for the boards of the other side of the habitation,—and five bars for the boards of the habitation at the hinderpart westward.

content: 33 And he made the middle bar,—to run along in the midst of the boards, from end to end.
content_old: 33 And he made the middle bar,—to run along in the midst of the boards, from end to end.

content: 34 And the boards overlaid he with gold､ and their rings made he of gold, as receptacles for the bars,—and he overlaid the bars with gold.
content_old: 34 And the boards overlaid he with gold､ and their rings made he of gold, as receptacles for the bars,—and he overlaid the bars with gold.

content: 35 And he made the veil, of blue and purple and crimson､ and fine-twined linen.—of the work of a skilful weaver made he it､ with cherubim.
content_old: 35 And he made the veil, of blue and purple and crimson､ and fine-twined linen.—of the work of a skilful weaver made he it､ with cherubim.

content: 36 And he made for it—four pillars of acacia, and overlaid them with gold their hooks of gold,—and cast for them､ four sockets of silver.
content_old: 36 And he made for it—four pillars of acacia, and overlaid them with gold their hooks of gold,—and cast for them､ four sockets of silver.

content_old: 37 And he made a screen for the opening of the tent, of blue and purple and crimson and fine twined linen､ the work of an embroiderer;

content: 1 And Bezaleel made the ark､ of acacia wood,—two cubits and a half the length thereof､ and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof;
content_old: 1 And Bezaleel made the ark､ of acacia wood,—two cubits and a half the length thereof､ and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof;

content: 2 and he overlaid it with pure gold､ within and without,—and made for it a rim of gold､ round about;
content_old: 2 and he overlaid it with pure gold､ within and without,—and made for it a rim of gold､ round about;

content: 3 and he cast for it four rings of gold, upon the four feet thereof,—even two rings on the one side thereof and two rings on the other side thereof;
content_old: 3 and he cast for it four rings of gold, upon the four feet thereof,—even two rings on the one side thereof and two rings on the other side thereof;

content: 4 and he made staves of acacia wood,—and overlaid them with gold;
content_old: 4 and he made staves of acacia wood,—and overlaid them with gold;

content: 5 and he brought the staves into the rings, upon the sides of the ark,—for lifting the ark.
content_old: 5 and he brought the staves into the rings, upon the sides of the ark,—for lifting the ark.

content: 6 And he made a propitiatory of pure gold,—two cubits and a half the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof:
content_old: 6 And he made a propitiatory of pure gold,—two cubits and a half the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof:

content: 7 and he made two cherubim､ of gold,—of beaten work did he make them, out of the two ends of the propitiatory:
content_old: 7 and he made two cherubim､ of gold,—of beaten work did he make them, out of the two ends of the propitiatory:

content: 8 one cherub out of this end, and one cherub out of that end,—out of the propitiatory itself made he the cherubim､ out of the two ends thereof:
content_old: 8 one cherub out of this end, and one cherub out of that end,—out of the propitiatory itself made he the cherubim､ out of the two ends thereof:

content: 9 and the cherubim were spreading out their wings on high､ making a shelter with their wings over the propitiatory, with their faces one towards the other,—towards the propitiatory were the faces of the cherubim.
content_old: 9 and the cherubim were spreading out their wings on high､ making a shelter with their wings over the propitiatory, with their faces one towards the other,—towards the propitiatory were the faces of the cherubim.

content: 10 And he made the table､ of acacia wood,—two cubits the length thereof､ and a cubit the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.
content_old: 10 And he made the table､ of acacia wood,—two cubits the length thereof､ and a cubit the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.

content: 11 And he overlaid it､ with pure gold,—and he made thereto a rim of gold､ round about;
content_old: 11 And he overlaid it､ with pure gold,—and he made thereto a rim of gold､ round about;

content: 12 and he made thereto a border of a handbreadth､ round about,—and he made a rim of gold to the border thereof､ round about;
content_old: 12 and he made thereto a border of a handbreadth､ round about,—and he made a rim of gold to the border thereof､ round about;

content: 13 and he cast for it, four rings of gold,—and placed the rings upon the four corners, which pertained to the four feet thereof:
content_old: 13 and he cast for it, four rings of gold,—and placed the rings upon the four corners, which pertained to the four feet thereof:

content: 14 near to the border were the rings,—as receptacles for the staves, for lifting the table;
content_old: 14 near to the border were the rings,—as receptacles for the staves, for lifting the table;

content: 15 and he made the staves of acacia wood, and overlaid them with gold,—for lifting the table;
content_old: 15 and he made the staves of acacia wood, and overlaid them with gold,—for lifting the table;

content: 16 and he made the utensils which were to be upon the table—its dishes､ and its pans､ and its bowls, and its basins､ for pouring out therewith,—of pure gold.
content_old: 16 and he made the utensils which were to be upon the table—its dishes､ and its pans､ and its bowls, and its basins､ for pouring out therewith,—of pure gold.

content: 17 And he made the lampstand､ of pure gold,—of beaten work made he the lampstand—its base and its shafts, its cups､ its apples and its blossoms were of the same;
content_old: 17 And he made the lampstand､ of pure gold,—of beaten work made he the lampstand—its base and its shafts, its cups､ its apples and its blossoms were of the same;

content: 18 with six branches coming out of its sides,—three branches of the lampstand out of its one side, and three branches of the lampstand out of its other side:
content_old: 18 with six branches coming out of its sides,—three branches of the lampstand out of its one side, and three branches of the lampstand out of its other side:

content: 19 three cups like almond-flowers in the one branch—apple and blossom, and three cups like almond-flowers in the next branch､ apple and blossom,—so for the six branches､ coming out of the lampstand;
content_old: 19 three cups like almond-flowers in the one branch—apple and blossom, and three cups like almond-flowers in the next branch､ apple and blossom,—so for the six branches､ coming out of the lampstand;

content: 20 and in the lampstand itself four cups,—like almond-flowers, its apples and its blossoms;
content_old: 20 and in the lampstand itself four cups,—like almond-flowers, its apples and its blossoms;

content: 21 with an apple under the two branches､ of the same, and an apple under the next two branches､ of the same, and an apple under the next two branches of the same,—for the six branches coming out of the same:
content_old: 21 with an apple under the two branches､ of the same, and an apple under the next two branches､ of the same, and an apple under the next two branches of the same,—for the six branches coming out of the same:

content: 22 their apples and their branches were of the same,—all of it one beaten work､ of pure gold.
content_old: 22 their apples and their branches were of the same,—all of it one beaten work､ of pure gold.

content: 23 And he made the lamps thereof､ seven,—with its snuffers and its snuff-trays､ of pure gold.
content_old: 23 And he made the lamps thereof､ seven,—with its snuffers and its snuff-trays､ of pure gold.

content: 24 Of a talent of pure gold made he it,—and all the utensils thereof.
content_old: 24 Of a talent of pure gold made he it,—and all the utensils thereof.

content: 25 And he made the incense altar､ of acacia wood,—a cubit the length thereof､ and a cubit the breadth thereof､foursquare, and two cubits the height thereof, of the same were the horns thereof.
content_old: 25 And he made the incense altar､ of acacia wood,—a cubit the length thereof､ and a cubit the breadth thereof､foursquare, and two cubits the height thereof, of the same were the horns thereof.

content: 26 And he overlaid it with pure gold—the top thereof and the sides thereof round about､ and the horns thereof,—and he made thereto a rim of gold､ round about.
content_old: 26 And he overlaid it with pure gold—the top thereof and the sides thereof round about､ and the horns thereof,—and he made thereto a rim of gold､ round about.

content: 27 And two rings of gold made he thereto—beneath the rim thereof､ upon the two corners thereof, upon the two sides thereof,—as receptacles for the staves, to lift it therewith.
content_old: 27 And two rings of gold made he thereto—beneath the rim thereof､ upon the two corners thereof, upon the two sides thereof,—as receptacles for the staves, to lift it therewith.

content: 1 And he made the altar for the ascending-sacrifice of acacia wood,—five cubits the length thereof､ and five cubits the breadth thereof､foursquare, and three cubits the height thereof.
content_old: 1 And he made the altar for the ascending-sacrifice of acacia wood,—five cubits the length thereof､ and five cubits the breadth thereof､foursquare, and three cubits the height thereof.

content: 2 And he made the horns thereof､ upon the four corners thereof, of the same were the horns thereof,—and he overlaid it with bronze.
content_old: 2 And he made the horns thereof､ upon the four corners thereof, of the same were the horns thereof,—and he overlaid it with bronze.

content: 3 And he made all the utensils of the altar—the pans and the shovels､ and the sprinkling bowls, the flesh-hooks and the firepans,—all the utensils thereof made he of bronze.
content_old: 3 And he made all the utensils of the altar—the pans and the shovels､ and the sprinkling bowls, the flesh-hooks and the firepans,—all the utensils thereof made he of bronze.

content: 4 And he made to the altar a grating, of network of bronze,—under the margin thereof beneath､ as far as the midst thereof.
content_old: 4 And he made to the altar a grating, of network of bronze,—under the margin thereof beneath､ as far as the midst thereof.

content: 5 And he cast four rings in the four corners､ to the grating of bronze,—as receptacles for the staves.
content_old: 5 And he cast four rings in the four corners､ to the grating of bronze,—as receptacles for the staves.

content: 6 And he made the staves of acacia wood,—and overlaid them with bronze.
content_old: 6 And he made the staves of acacia wood,—and overlaid them with bronze.

content: 7 And he brought the staves into the rings､ upon the sides of the altar, to lift it therewith,—hoIlow with boards did he make it.

content_old: 8 And he made the laver of bronze, and the stand thereof of bronze,—with the mirrors of the female hosts who did service at the opening of the tent of meeting.

content: 10 their pillars twenty, and their sockets twenty, of bronze,—the hooks of the pillars and their connecting-rods､ of silver:
content_old: 10 their pillars twenty, and their sockets twenty, of bronze,—the hooks of the pillars and their connecting-rods､ of silver:

content: 11 and on the north side a hundred cubits, their pillars twenty､ and their sockets twenty､ of bronze,—the hooks of the pillars and their connecting-rods of silver.

content_old: 12 And on the west side hangings fifty cubits, their pillars ten､ and their sockets ten,—and the hooks of the pillars and their connecting-rods of silver.

content: 13 And on the east side towards the dawn fifty cubits:
content_old: 13 And on the east side towards the dawn fifty cubits:

content: 14 hangings fifteen cubits､ for the side-piece,—their pillars three, and their sockets three;
content_old: 14 hangings fifteen cubits､ for the side-piece,—their pillars three, and their sockets three;

content: 15 and for the second sidepiece､ on this side and on that､ of the gate of the court hangings fifteen cubits,—their pillars three, and their sockets three.

content_old: 18 And the screen of the gate of the court was the work of an embroiderer, blue and purple and crimson､ and fine twined linen,—and twenty cubits in length, and the height, according to the breadth, of five cubits, to match the curtains of the court;

content: 20 And all the pins for the habitation､ and for the court round about, of bronze.

content: 22 So then Bezaleel､ son of Uri､ son of Hur､ of the tribe of Judah made all that Yahweh had commanded Moses.

content_old: 23 And with him was Oholiab､ son of Ahisamach, of the tribe of Dan､ an artificer and skilful weaver,—and an embroiderer—in blue, and in purple､ and in crimson､ and in fine linen.

content: 24 As for all the gold that was used for the work, in all the construction of the sanctuary it came to pass that the gold of the wave-offering was nine-and-twenty talents, and seven hundred and thirty shekels､ by the shekel of the sanctuary.
content_old: 24 As for all the gold that was used for the work, in all the construction of the sanctuary it came to pass that the gold of the wave-offering was nine-and-twenty talents, and seven hundred and thirty shekels､ by the shekel of the sanctuary.

content: 25 And the silver of them who were numbered of the assembly was one hundred talents,—and one thousand､ seven hundred､ and seventy-five shekels､ by the shekel of the sanctuary;
content_old: 25 And the silver of them who were numbered of the assembly was one hundred talents,—and one thousand､ seven hundred､ and seventy-five shekels､ by the shekel of the sanctuary;

content: 26 a a bekah per head, that is a half shekel､ by the shekel of the sanctuary､ for all that passed over to them who had been numbered､ from twenty years old､ and upwards, for six hundred and three thousand, and five hundred and fifty.

content: 1 And of the blue､ and the purple､ and the crimson made they cloths of variegated stuff､ for ministering in the sanctuary,—and they made the holy garments which were for Aaron,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 2 So he made the ephod,—of gold､ blue､ and purple､ and crimson､ and fine twined linen,
content_old: 2 So he made the ephod,—of gold､ blue､ and purple､ and crimson､ and fine twined linen,

content: 3 And they did beat out the plates of gold､ and he proceeded to cut them into threads, to work into the midst of the blue､ and into the midst of the purple､ and into the midst of the crimson, and into the midst of the fine linen,—with the work of a skilful weaver.
content_old: 3 And they did beat out the plates of gold､ and he proceeded to cut them into threads, to work into the midst of the blue､ and into the midst of the purple､ and into the midst of the crimson, and into the midst of the fine linen,—with the work of a skilful weaver.

content: 4 Shoulder-pieces made they thereto､ for joining,—at its two edges was it joined.
content_old: 4 Shoulder-pieces made they thereto､ for joining,—at its two edges was it joined.

content: 5 And as for the curious fastening girdle which was thereon of the same it was according to the working thereof, gold､ blue､ and purple､ and crimson､ and fine twined linen,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 5 And as for the curious fastening girdle which was thereon of the same it was according to the working thereof, gold､ blue､ and purple､ and crimson､ and fine twined linen,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 6 And they wrought the onyx stones, enclosed in ouches of gold,—graven with the engravings of a seal-ring, after the names of the sons of Israel.
content_old: 6 And they wrought the onyx stones, enclosed in ouches of gold,—graven with the engravings of a seal-ring, after the names of the sons of Israel.

content: 7 And he put them on the shoulder-pieces of the ephod, as stones of memorial､ for the sons of Israel,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 7 And he put them on the shoulder-pieces of the ephod, as stones of memorial､ for the sons of Israel,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 8 And he made the breastpiece､ the work of a skilful weaver､ like the work of the ephod,—of gold､ blue､ and purple､ and crimson､ and fine twined linen.
content_old: 8 And he made the breastpiece､ the work of a skilful weaver､ like the work of the ephod,—of gold､ blue､ and purple､ and crimson､ and fine twined linen.

content: 9 Foursquare it was､ doubled made they the breastpiece,—a span was the length thereof､ and a span the breadth thereof､doubled.
content_old: 9 Foursquare it was､ doubled made they the breastpiece,—a span was the length thereof､ and a span the breadth thereof､doubled.

content: 10 And they set therein､ four rows of stones,—one row a sardius､ a topaz､ and an emerald, the first row;
content_old: 10 And they set therein､ four rows of stones,—one row a sardius､ a topaz､ and an emerald, the first row;

content: 11 and the second row,—a carbuncle､ a sapphire､ and a diamond;
content_old: 11 and the second row,—a carbuncle､ a sapphire､ and a diamond;

content: 12 and the third row,—an opal､ an agate､ and an amethyst;
content_old: 12 and the third row,—an opal､ an agate､ and an amethyst;

content: 13 and the fourth row, a Tarshish stone､ a sardonyx､ and a jasper,—enclosed in ouches of gold､when they were set
content_old: 13 and the fourth row, a Tarshish stone､ a sardonyx､ and a jasper,—enclosed in ouches of gold､when they were set

content: 14 And as for the stones after the names of the sons of Israel they were twelve､ after their names,—with the engravings of a seal-ring, each one after his name, for the twelve tribes.
content_old: 14 And as for the stones after the names of the sons of Israel they were twelve､ after their names,—with the engravings of a seal-ring, each one after his name, for the twelve tribes.

content: 15 And they made､ upon the breastpiece､ chains like cords､ of wreathen work,—of pure gold.
content_old: 15 And they made､ upon the breastpiece､ chains like cords､ of wreathen work,—of pure gold.

content: 16 And they made two ouches of gold, and two rings of gold,—and they placed the two rings､ upon the two ends of the breastpiece;
content_old: 16 And they made two ouches of gold, and two rings of gold,—and they placed the two rings､ upon the two ends of the breastpiece;

content: 17 and they placed the two wreathen chains of gold､ upon the two rings,—upon the ends of the breastpiece;
content_old: 17 and they placed the two wreathen chains of gold､ upon the two rings,—upon the ends of the breastpiece;

content: 18 and the other two ends of the two wreathen chains placed they upon the two ouches,—and placed them upon the shoulder-pieces of the ephod､ in the forefront thereof.
content_old: 18 and the other two ends of the two wreathen chains placed they upon the two ouches,—and placed them upon the shoulder-pieces of the ephod､ in the forefront thereof.

content: 19 And they made two rings of gold, and put on the two ends of the breastpiece,—upon the border thereof､ which is towards the ephod､ inwards.
content_old: 19 And they made two rings of gold, and put on the two ends of the breastpiece,—upon the border thereof､ which is towards the ephod､ inwards.

content: 20 And they made two other rings of gold, and placed them upon the two shoulder-pieces of the ephod､ below､ on the front of the face thereof, to match the joining thereof,—above the curious girdle of the ephod.
content_old: 20 And they made two other rings of gold, and placed them upon the two shoulder-pieces of the ephod､ below､ on the front of the face thereof, to match the joining thereof,—above the curious girdle of the ephod.

content: 21 And they bound the breastpiece by the rings thereof､ into the rings of the ephod､ with a cord of blue､ that it might remain upon the curious girdle of the ephod, and the breastpiece not be removed from upon the ephod,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 21 And they bound the breastpiece by the rings thereof､ into the rings of the ephod､ with a cord of blue､ that it might remain upon the curious girdle of the ephod, and the breastpiece not be removed from upon the ephod,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 22 And he made the robe of the ephod､ the work of a weaver,—wholly of blue;
content_old: 22 And he made the robe of the ephod､ the work of a weaver,—wholly of blue;

content: 23 with the opening of the robe in the midst thereof､ like the opening of a coat of mail,—a border to the opening thereof round about—it might not be rent open.
content_old: 23 with the opening of the robe in the midst thereof､ like the opening of a coat of mail,—a border to the opening thereof round about—it might not be rent open.

content: 24 And they made､ upon the skirts of the robe､ pomegranates—of blue and purple and crimson,—twined.
content_old: 24 And they made､ upon the skirts of the robe､ pomegranates—of blue and purple and crimson,—twined.

content: 25 And they made bells of pure gold,—and placed the bells in the midst of the pomegranates､ upon the skirts of the robe､ round about, in the midst of the pomegranates:
content_old: 25 And they made bells of pure gold,—and placed the bells in the midst of the pomegranates､ upon the skirts of the robe､ round about, in the midst of the pomegranates:

content: 26 a bell and a pomegranate､ a bell and a pomegranate, upon the skirts of the robe､ round about,—to minister in— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 26 a bell and a pomegranate､ a bell and a pomegranate, upon the skirts of the robe､ round about,—to minister in— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 27 And they made the tunics of fine linen､ the work of a weaver,—for Aaron､ and for his sons;
content_old: 27 And they made the tunics of fine linen､ the work of a weaver,—for Aaron､ and for his sons;

content: 28 and the turban of fine linen, and the ornamental caps of fine linen,—and the linen drawers､ of fine twined linen;
content_old: 28 and the turban of fine linen, and the ornamental caps of fine linen,—and the linen drawers､ of fine twined linen;

content: 29 and the girdle of fine twined linen､ and blue and purple and crimson､ the work of an embroiderer,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 29 and the girdle of fine twined linen､ and blue and purple and crimson､ the work of an embroiderer,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 30 And they made the burnished plate of the holy crown､ of pure gold,—and wrote thereupon a writing､ with the engravings of a seal-ring Holy unto Yahweh.
content_old: 30 And they made the burnished plate of the holy crown､ of pure gold,—and wrote thereupon a writing､ with the engravings of a seal-ring Holy unto Yahweh.

content: 31 And they placed thereupon a cord of blue, to fasten it upon the turban up above,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 31 And they placed thereupon a cord of blue, to fasten it upon the turban up above,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 32 Thus was finished all the work of the habitation､ of the tent of meeting,—thus did the sons of Israel, according to all that Yahweh commanded Moses so did they.
content_old: 32 Thus was finished all the work of the habitation､ of the tent of meeting,—thus did the sons of Israel, according to all that Yahweh commanded Moses so did they.

content: 33 And they brought in the habitation､ unto Moses, the tent､ and all its furniture,—its clasps､ its boards, its bars､ and its pillars and its sockets;
content_old: 33 And they brought in the habitation､ unto Moses, the tent､ and all its furniture,—its clasps､ its boards, its bars､ and its pillars and its sockets;

content: 34 and the covering of rams’ skins dyed red, and the covering of badgers’ skins,—and the screening veil;
content_old: 34 and the covering of rams’ skins dyed red, and the covering of badgers’ skins,—and the screening veil;

content: 35 the ark of the testimony､ with its staves,—and the propitiatory;
content_old: 35 the ark of the testimony､ with its staves,—and the propitiatory;

content: 36 the table､ all its utensils, and the Presence-bread;
content_old: 36 the table､ all its utensils, and the Presence-bread;

content: 37 the pure lampstand､ the lamps thereof､ the lamps to be put in order､ and all the utensils thereof,—and the oil for giving light;
content_old: 37 the pure lampstand､ the lamps thereof､ the lamps to be put in order､ and all the utensils thereof,—and the oil for giving light;

content: 38 and the altar of gold, and the oil of anointing, and the fragrant incense,—and the screen for the opening of the tent;
content_old: 38 and the altar of gold, and the oil of anointing, and the fragrant incense,—and the screen for the opening of the tent;

content: 39 the altar of bronze､ and the grating of bronze which pertaineth thereto, the staves thereof､ and all the utensils thereof,—the laver､ and its stand,
content_old: 39 the altar of bronze､ and the grating of bronze which pertaineth thereto, the staves thereof､ and all the utensils thereof,—the laver､ and its stand,

content: 40 the hangings of the court､ its pillars and its sockets､ and the screen for the gate of the court, its cords､ and its pins,—and all the utensils for the service of the habitation､ for the tent of meeting;
content_old: 40 the hangings of the court､ its pillars and its sockets､ and the screen for the gate of the court, its cords､ and its pins,—and all the utensils for the service of the habitation､ for the tent of meeting;

content: 41 the cloths of variegated stuff､ for ministering in the sanctuary,—the holy garments for Aaron the priest, and the garments of his sons､ for ministering as priests.
content_old: 41 the cloths of variegated stuff､ for ministering in the sanctuary,—the holy garments for Aaron the priest, and the garments of his sons､ for ministering as priests.

content: 42 According to all that Yahweh commanded Moses so did the sons of Israel make all the work.
content_old: 42 According to all that Yahweh commanded Moses so did the sons of Israel make all the work.

content: 1 Then spake Yahweh､ unto Moses､ saying—
content_old: 1 Then spake Yahweh､ unto Moses､ saying—

content: 2 On the first day of the month, in the first month shalt thou rear the habitation､ of the tent of meeting;
content_old: 2 On the first day of the month, in the first month shalt thou rear the habitation､ of the tent of meeting;

content: 3 and thou shalt put therein, the ark of the testimony,—and shalt screen the ark､ with the veil;
content_old: 3 and thou shalt put therein, the ark of the testimony,—and shalt screen the ark､ with the veil;

content: 4 and thou shalt bring in the table, and set in order what is to be arranged thereupon,—and thou shalt bring in the lampstand, and mount the lamps thereof;
content_old: 4 and thou shalt bring in the table, and set in order what is to be arranged thereupon,—and thou shalt bring in the lampstand, and mount the lamps thereof;

content: 5 and thou shalt place the altar of gold､ for incense, before the ark of the testimony,—and put up the screen for the opening of the habitation;
content_old: 5 and thou shalt place the altar of gold､ for incense, before the ark of the testimony,—and put up the screen for the opening of the habitation;

content: 6 and thou shalt place the altar for the ascending-sacrifice,—before the opening of the habitation of the tent of meeting;
content_old: 6 and thou shalt place the altar for the ascending-sacrifice,—before the opening of the habitation of the tent of meeting;

content: 7 and thou shalt place the laver between the tent of meeting､ and the altar,—and shalt put､ therein､ water,
content_old: 7 and thou shalt place the laver between the tent of meeting､ and the altar,—and shalt put､ therein､ water,

content: 8 And thou shalt put up the court､ round about,—and hang up the screen of the gate of the court.
content_old: 8 And thou shalt put up the court､ round about,—and hang up the screen of the gate of the court.

content: 9 And thou shalt take the oil of anointing, and anoint the habitation､ and all that is therein,—and shalt hallow it､ and all the furniture thereof､ so shall it be holy.
content_old: 9 And thou shalt take the oil of anointing, and anoint the habitation､ and all that is therein,—and shalt hallow it､ and all the furniture thereof､ so shall it be holy.

content: 10 And thou shalt anoint the altar of ascending sacrifice､ and all its utensils,—and hallow the altar, so shall the altar be most holy:
content_old: 10 And thou shalt anoint the altar of ascending sacrifice､ and all its utensils,—and hallow the altar, so shall the altar be most holy:

content: 11 and thou shalt anoint the laver､ and its stand,—and shalt hallow it.
content_old: 11 and thou shalt anoint the laver､ and its stand,—and shalt hallow it.

content: 12 And thou shalt bring near Aaron､ and his sons, unto the opening of the tent of meeting,—and shalt bathe them in the water;
content_old: 12 And thou shalt bring near Aaron､ and his sons, unto the opening of the tent of meeting,—and shalt bathe them in the water;

content: 13 and thou shalt clothe Aaron with the holy garments,—and shalt anoint him､ and hallow him､ so shall he minister as priest unto me.
content_old: 13 and thou shalt clothe Aaron with the holy garments,—and shalt anoint him､ and hallow him､ so shall he minister as priest unto me.

content: 14 His sons also shalt thou bring near,—and shalt clothe them with tunics;
content_old: 14 His sons also shalt thou bring near,—and shalt clothe them with tunics;

content: 15 and shalt anoint them､ as thou didst anoint their father, and they shall minister as priests unto me,—so shall their anointing remain to them､ for an age-abiding priesthood､ to their generations.
content_old: 15 and shalt anoint them､ as thou didst anoint their father, and they shall minister as priests unto me,—so shall their anointing remain to them､ for an age-abiding priesthood､ to their generations.

content: 16 And Moses did,—according to all that Yahweh had commanded him so did he.
content_old: 16 And Moses did,—according to all that Yahweh had commanded him so did he.

content: 17 Thus came it to pass in the first month､ in the second year､ on the first of the month that the habitation was reared.
content_old: 17 Thus came it to pass in the first month､ in the second year､ on the first of the month that the habitation was reared.

content: 18 Yea Moses reared the habitation､ and placed its sockets, and fixed its boards, and fastened its bars,—and reared its pillars.
content_old: 18 Yea Moses reared the habitation､ and placed its sockets, and fixed its boards, and fastened its bars,—and reared its pillars.

content: 19 Then spread he abroad the tent upon the habitation, and put the covering of the tent upon it､above,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 19 Then spread he abroad the tent upon the habitation, and put the covering of the tent upon it､above,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 20 And he took and placed the testimony､ within the ark, and put the staves upon the ark,—and placed the propitiatory upon the ark above;
content_old: 20 And he took and placed the testimony､ within the ark, and put the staves upon the ark,—and placed the propitiatory upon the ark above;

content: 21 and brought in the ark into the habitation, and put up the screening veil, and screened over the ark of the testimony,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 21 and brought in the ark into the habitation, and put up the screening veil, and screened over the ark of the testimony,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 22 And he placed the table､ in the tent of meeting,—on the side of the habitation northward,—outside the veil;
content_old: 22 And he placed the table､ in the tent of meeting,—on the side of the habitation northward,—outside the veil;

content: 23 and set in order thereupon the arrangement of bread､ before Yahweh,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 23 and set in order thereupon the arrangement of bread､ before Yahweh,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 24 And he put the lampstand､ in the tent of meeting, over against the table,—on the side of the habitation､southward;
content_old: 24 And he put the lampstand､ in the tent of meeting, over against the table,—on the side of the habitation､southward;

content: 25 and mounted the lamps､ before Yahweh,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 25 and mounted the lamps､ before Yahweh,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 26 And he put the altar of gold､ in the tent of meeting,—before the veil;
content_old: 26 And he put the altar of gold､ in the tent of meeting,—before the veil;

content: 27 and burned thereupon the fragrant incense,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 27 and burned thereupon the fragrant incense,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 28 And he put up the screen of the entrance pertaining to the habitation;
content_old: 28 And he put up the screen of the entrance pertaining to the habitation;

content: 29 and the altar of ascending-sacrifice put he at the entrance of the habitation of the tent of meeting,—and he caused to ascend thereupon､ the ascending-sacrifice､ and the meal-offering,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 29 and the altar of ascending-sacrifice put he at the entrance of the habitation of the tent of meeting,—and he caused to ascend thereupon､ the ascending-sacrifice､ and the meal-offering,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 30 And he put the laver, between the tent of meeting､ and the altar,—and put therein water､ for bathing;
content_old: 30 And he put the laver, between the tent of meeting､ and the altar,—and put therein water､ for bathing;

content: 31 and Moses､ and Aaron､ and his sons､ thenceforth bathed thereat,—their hands and their feet;
content_old: 31 and Moses､ and Aaron､ and his sons､ thenceforth bathed thereat,—their hands and their feet;

content: 32 when they were entering into the tent of meeting､ and when they were drawing near unto the altar then used they to bathe,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 32 when they were entering into the tent of meeting､ and when they were drawing near unto the altar then used they to bathe,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 33 And he reared the court､ round about､ to the habitation and to the altar, and put up the screen of the gate of the court,—and Moses finished the work.
content_old: 33 And he reared the court､ round about､ to the habitation and to the altar, and put up the screen of the gate of the court,—and Moses finished the work.

content: 34 Then did the cloud cover the tent of meeting,—and the glory of Yahweh filled the habitation;
content_old: 34 Then did the cloud cover the tent of meeting,—and the glory of Yahweh filled the habitation;

content: 35 and Moses was not able to enter into the tent of meeting, because the cloud had made its habitation thereupon,—and the glory of Yahweh filled the habitation.
content_old: 35 and Moses was not able to enter into the tent of meeting, because the cloud had made its habitation thereupon,—and the glory of Yahweh filled the habitation.

content: 36 And whensoever the cloud ascended from off the habitation then did the sons of Israel set forward,—in all their journeyings;
content_old: 36 And whensoever the cloud ascended from off the habitation then did the sons of Israel set forward,—in all their journeyings;

content: 37 but if the cloud did not ascend then did they not set forward,—until the day when it did ascend.
content_old: 37 but if the cloud did not ascend then did they not set forward,—until the day when it did ascend.
